## Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) - Professional Services in Environmental Impact Assessment and Ecological Services

### Background

The National Capital Commission (NCC) is a federal Crown corporation responsible for planning and developing federal lands in the National Capital Region. The NCC is seeking the services of consulting firms to provide professional services in environmental impact assessment and ecological services on an "as and when requested" basis.

### Objective

The NCC intends to retain the services of consulting firms to provide professional services in environmental impact assessment and ecological services under a Standing Offer Agreement (SOA). The SOA will be used to deliver projects at various locations on NCC lands in the National Capital Region in Ontario and Quebec. The NCC will award a maximum of eight SOAs.

### Contract Details

* The SOA will be active for a maximum period of four years from the date of award or until total expenditure level is attained, whichever comes first.
* Successful SOA holders will have the option to extend the contract by two additional one-year periods.
* The NCC will award the SOAs through a competitive process.

### Enquiries

All enquiries regarding this RFSO must be submitted in writing to Emilie Scheckman, Senior Contract Officer, at [emilie.scheckman@ncc-ccn.ca](mailto:emilie.scheckman@ncc-ccn.ca). Enquiries should be received no later than fourteen (14) calendar days prior to the tender closing date.

### Tender Documents

The Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) document and all amendment notices can be downloaded from the Government Electronic Tendering Service website at [Tender opportunities | CanadaBuys](https://www.canadabuys.ca).

### Tender Closing Date

The tender closing date is April 12, 2023, at 15:00:00.

### Notice of Expiration

This RFSO has expired and is no longer active.

### IMPORTANT NOTICE

* The procurement process is subject to trade agreements listed above.
* The official Government Electronic Tendering Service website is Tender opportunities | CanadaBuys.
